inn1.comm: lands it outside the off stump and he leaves it alone to the keeper
and Sharjeel nearly edges that! This was a shade outside off, too close to cut and the ball misses the edge by a whisker
makes contact this time, nicely cut away wide of backward point but third man's square
keeps it on a good length outside off, not too much bounce and he stays back to defend
similar length outside the off stump and he goes back to defend
comes on to the bat quite slowly and he goes back and clips it wide of mid-on
Shehzad stays on the back foot and softly punches this one to the off side
that one rolled to the wicketkeeper! Where did that come from? Left alone and Sanga was taken by surprise
nothing alarming about the bounce here, outside off and moving away, left alone
keeps it on the off stump, he stays back at the crease and defends
doesn't give him much room and he stays back and punches it to the off side
gives him a bit of room and he stays back and looks to beat point but can't get it past the infield
angles it towards the pads and he clips it away towards midwicket
keeps it on the off stump and he stays back and punches it to the off side
he gets some width this time and looks to spank it away square on the off side but mistimes it to point
nicely flicked away wide of mid-on and midwicket, plays it with the movement, uses the wrists well but the outfield not to quick
he stays right back and defends to the off side
lovely drive! Even the outfield couldn't slow this down, length ball on middle and leg and shows the full face of the bat and beats mid-on, driven straight

we saw one that rolled but this one really shot up! Sharjeel not ready for that extra bounce, bent down to avoid it, took his eyes off the ball, the ball lobs off the shoulder to Sanga who appeals for a catch
take that for a response! This was banged in short and Sharjeel wasn't going to hold back, stays back and pulls it with force over deep midwicket, ball hits the roof
this time Malinga fires it full but to no avail, this was drifting on the pads, gift for Sharjeel who flicks it away to fine leg
much better, on the off stump and he stays back and defends
quite stylish! Length ball drifting on the stumps and Sharjeel picks that from off and middle and flicks it behind square on the off side, sends the ball scurrying away
lucky to get away with an inside edge this time, outside off and looks to drive and the ball rolls to the leg side, 16 off that over
drifting on the body and he tucks it to the on side
this lad's good! This was shorter in length but you can't bowl that on this surface, he picks that from the off stump and pulls on one leg over midwicket
false shot there, short of a length pitching outside leg, he looks to play another pull but the ball hits him on the thigh pad, misread the bounce, appeal for a leg before
drifts on the body and he tucks it to the on side off the pads
fires that full and he looks to crash it straight but can't beat mid-off
fires it on a yorker length outside off and he jams it out to mid-off
tossed up and he gets forward and defends
bowls this one fuller and he defends
on the pads and he clips it to the on side
fuller on the stumps and he defends
too full and he drives this one down to midwicket
he's strong on the on side, clips it with the angle down to deep midwicket

Shehzad has been given out lbw and he wants it reviewed. But the batsman took ages to signal it to the umpire and he has to go because he was timed out! Bowled from slightly wide of the crease and angles the ball inwards, Shehzad shuffled across and exposed his leg stump, struck a bit high on the pads, you could see the leg stump and that's what had him in trouble, Hawk Eye shows that hitting the top of middle, guess it wouldn't have been overturned anyway
Hafeez solid in defense first ball, gets nicely behind the line
drifts on the pads and he clips it to the on side
good length on the off stump and defended to the off side
he stays back and punches it to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
no turn and he comes forward and defends
chips down the track and he checks his shot and plays it softly
stays back and he punches it to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
straighter one and he comes forward and defends
this was full outside off, Hafeez went forward and across and drives him wide of cover, nicely timed
Lakmal errs by bowling on the pads, easily done by Hafeez as he shuffles and sends it on its way to fine leg
fuller ball and he comes forward and defends
on a good length and he stays back and pushes it to third man
Sharjeel looks yo slash it away but he misses
came on quite slowly and he stays beside the line and angles it wide of point
goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
full on the pads and he clips it to midwicket
continues round the wicket, he comes forward and defends
stays back and tucks it back to the bowler
fuller in length and he defends
gets forward and clips it down to mid-on
Thisara bowls this one short of a length, fetches it from outside off and pulls down to deep midwicket, there was no midwicket, didn't time it as well
goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
gets forward and drills it firmly back to the bowler
gets on the back foot and punches it straight to mid-off
he gives him width this time and punches him past the big gap at point
tucks him up for room and he punches it to the off side
loosener outside the off stump, comes forward and drives straight to cover
a bit too straight and he shuffles and clips him to fine leg
not short enough to pull, didn't bounce as much but he stayed back and mistimed him to midwicket
outside off and he had the time to open the face and steer it to third man
comes on a bit slowly and he punches it to mid-off
tries to pinch this one past cover but can't beat the infield
easily done! This was a fuller one wide outside off and Sharjeel gets across and effortlessly lofted it through the line over mid-off, one bounce and four
fine leg is up and Sharjeel clips it straight to him, Thisara gets away with it
this was effortless! Another fuller one, picks that from middle and nonchalantly lofted him over wide long-on,  sends it several rows back, looked like a practice golf swing
goes a few more rows over! This guy's barely breaking into a sweat, pounces on a poor length, short of a length, not much pace, pulled it several rows over deep midwicket
comes round the wicket and he scoops it towards third man
he stays right back and defends, 17 off the over
he looks to defend very close to the pads, there was an appeal for a lbw for the possibility that it may have hit the pad and then bat, they decide not to review it
stays back and he clips it off his pads
stays back at the crease and defends

short one and he mistimes the pull over midwicket, Sharjeel was lazy in completing the second run and there was a direct hit, they take an overthrow off the deflection, it is not referred because the umpire was certain he had made his ground, which he did
slower ball and he defends to the off side and takes a single
comes down the track and checks his shot and the ball strikes the pad, stifled appeal
comes forward and pushes it to the on side
comes down the pitch and drills this wide of mid-on
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
comes on slowly and he stays back and punches it to the off side
fuller in length and he comes forward and defends
stays back at the crease and angles it down to third man
moves away and he gets across his stumps and places it wide of backward point
full on middle and leg and he flicks it away wide of midwicket, there's a fielder in the deep
Sharjeel plays very close to the pads and steers it to the off side, there was a throw to the bowler's end and before that an appeal for lbw, it was pad first but it landed outside leg anyway
tucks it down to the leg side for a single
he stays back and punches it to the off side
down the track and he checks his shot to the on side
goes back and tries to slap it through the off side but can't beat point
waits for it and punches it wide of cover
lovely shot to get to a landmark! Tossed up and Sharjeel comes down the track and launches it over mid-on, fifty on debut! The 8th Pakistan batsman to do so
goes back and slaps it straight to cover
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
a bit too straight and he stays back and clips it behind square
waits for it and guides it to third man
bit too full and wide outside off and driven to cover
he continues to swing and connect well, this was full and he lofts him clean over mid-off, one bounce and four
on the pads and he whips it away wide of square leg
fullish in length and he works it to midwicket
tossed up and he comes well forward and drives
gets forward and drives him to mid-on
gets forward and smothers the spin
this was too full and he gets across and drives wide of cover
comes on very slowly and he rocks back and mistimes it to cover

Dropped  by Thisara of all people! Sharjeel lofts a fuller one towards long-off, Perera ran forward and had it covered but the ball spilled out as he fell forward, he's normally a good catcher, Sharjeel dropped on 56
takes a single to long-on
gives him width and he punches it to the off side
he leans forward and across and drives him wide of cover and Thirimanne does well to dive and stop it at deep cover
tossed up by Dilshan and Hafeez gives the charge, gets under the bounce and lofts crisply over long-on
gives him width and he makes room and slaps it wide of sweeper cover, neat drive
clips it to the on side
tossed up and he drives to the off side
full on the stumps and defended
goes back and punches him down to long-off
tossed up and he drills this one down the track
gets forward and drives him down to long-on
tossed up and he comes forward and lofts it towards long-on
gets forward and defends to the off side
he goes back and clips him towards deep midwicket
he goes back and clips him towards midwicket
stylish reverse sweep but he will only get two for it, off the middle of the bat just wide of short third man
he stays back and punches it to the off side

caught right at the margins of the boundary! Tossed up by Prasanna, Sharjeel stayed at the crease and looked to loft him over long-on, it looked like it would carry over the rope but Senanayake stood on the edge and caught it just inches from the rope, judged that well and importantly maintained his balance
gets forward and drives him to long-off
gets forward and drives him to long-off
poor ball, too wide down the leg side and a freebie for Pakistan
flatter one and he comes forward and defends
risks going on the back foot and the ball hits the pads outside the line of leg and rolls to the off side
fullish on the pads and he works it away down to midwicket
punches it just wide of mid-on and sets off for a quick single
he stays behind the line and punches it away down to deep cover
he stays beside the line and punches it down to third man
he stays behind the line and punches it to the off side
tucks it down to the leg side
bowls that full and wide outside off and he drives him down to cover
this was fuller on the off stump and he drives straight to cover, can't pinch that gap
bowls an inswinging yorker and he nicely flicks it away down to fine leg
digs out another fuller ball down to mid-off and sets off quickly
he is firing in the yorkers and swinging them in, does well to dig it out to mid-on
that loopy low full toss! Maqsood waits for it and plays it very late, didn't look in control
drives and short cover dives and stops it
gets forward and drives to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and drives to the off side
flatter one and he comes forward and defends
makes room and comes forward and looks to drive and he still can't beat short cover
stays back and punches him down to long-on and Hafeez gets his fifty!
he stays back and punches him down to long-on
Maqsood's having a hard time digging out these yorkers, just about manages to do so again
inswinger again and he manages to whip it away wide of midwicket
fires it on a good length on the stumps and he stays back and defends
good running, he punches it on the front foot in front of mid-off and sets off quickly and his partner responds well
this time Maqsood comes down the pitch early to negate the yorker, slower in pace and he digs it out back to the bowler
down the track and he checks his shot to midwicket
gets forward and drives to the off side
gets forward and drives towards cover
flatter and quicker and Prasanna does well to dive to his right
comes forward and stabs it to the off side
flatter one and he stays back and defends
misfield at cover! Sloppy stuff from Kusal and Maqsood picks up a couple
effortless! A bit too short in length outside off and Maqsood stays back and times the punch well past cover
pushes it down to mid-off
pushes it towards mid-off and sets off and there's a direct hit at the bowler's end and they take a run off the deflection
short of a length and he punches it down to cover
shuffles and clips him down to midwicket
stays forward and mistimes it
down the track and fails to connect, the ball hits the pads
down the track and he mistimes it over the off side and it drops short of the rope, Thirimanne over runs it and the ball stops before the rope
just over the rope! Stays at the crease and lofts several miles up in the air, the fielder at long-on back pedals and the ball clears him
comes forward and defends to the leg side
stays beside he line and punches it to the off side
goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
quick single! Goes back and punches it in front of mid-off and sets off, Maqsood wasn't running straight enough, good for him there was no direct hit
punches it square on the off side for a single
punches it towards cover and can't beat the infield
he stays back and works it away down to midwicket
fired on the pads and he works it away down to square leg
he stays back and punches it towards point
fired wide down the leg side
comes down the track and punches it to the off side
pushes it wide of cover for a single
he goes back at the crease and punches it to sweeper cover
swinging in on the pads and he works it away to square leg
fires in the yorker and he does well to get his bat down to dig it out
fires that full and Maqsood drives straight to extra cover
digs out a yorker on middle and leg and the ball goes to mid-on, mid-off sprints and stops it
full on middle and leg and he drags it out to long-on
he bowls this one fuller and he gets his bat down and squirts it out
that was a flat six! Bowls a long hop from over the wicket, rocks back and clubs it over deep midwicket
pushes it to the off side for a single
round the wicket, goes back at the crease and punches it wide of cover
stays back and he clips it to midwicket
flatter ball and he punches it to cover
comes down the track and he drills it back to the bowler
digs out a low full toss towards mid-off
fires in a yorker and he does well to dig it out to the off side
this was also full and he squirts it out to mid-off
that was well bowled and equally well played, fires that on the pads and he whips out the yorker wide of square leg
fullish on the pads and he squirts it out to mid-on
fullish on the pads and he squirts it out to long-on, good over from Malinga
full and he punches it down to long-on
on the pads and worked away to the on side
he goes back and punches it down to cover
keeps low and he stays back, punched to point where Dilshan dives
good running, flatter one and he squeezes it out to mid-off and puts pressure on the fielder
he fired it flatter on seeing him advance, could only punch it back to the bowler
fires in the yorker which he digs out to the off side
down the track and he converts it to a full toss which he whips away straight to deep square leg
yorker length outside off and he squeezes it out to cover
he bowls this full on the pads and he squirts it out to the leg side
digs out a yorker wide of the bowler and picks up a single
full ball which he digs out to long-on
this has gone miles over wide long-on! Tossed up from Prasanna and Maqsood gets his front leg out of the way and hoicks it away, terrific stuff
full ball and he drills it to mid-off
pushed back to the bowler
he makes the mistake of giving him width, he makes room and crashes that down to deep cover, Lakmal dives in vain
flatter one and worked to the leg side
down the track and drills a full one to long-on
fires this one full and he drives it back to the bowler
full again and he firmly pushes this one to long-on
this was a fuller and quicker one and dug it out to mid-off
fires that on the pads and he works it to the on side
that's a good yorker, fast and close to the base of the stumps, Hafeez did well to get his bat in the way
another yorker and he digs it out to the off side
this was a full toss which he fails to smash away, can only take a single to long-on
fuller length outside off which he squeezed  to cover
sped off the bat, this was a length ball and he made room and swung it firmly wide of long-on
poor fielding! Low full toss and Hafeez swings it down towards deep midwicket, Kusal had it covered but messed it up on the dive, not the first bit of poor fielding from him tonight
jabs out a full ball to the off side to bring up the 100 stand
digs out a full ball towards long-on
Lakmal continues with the yorker length and Maqsood jams it out to cover
good bowling, persists with the yorker and he pushes it back to the bowler
swings it in and he clips it with the angle to deep square leg to bring up his 50! A good day for Pakistan youngsters
full on the pads and he clips it away down to fine leg
Maqsood walks across his stumps early to unsettle the bowler, forces a yorker to long-on
poor ball and put away! Full toss swinging in and Hafeez shuffles and easily worked away to fine leg, Malinga dives in vain, Hafeez in the 90s
down the track and he checks his shot and pushes it to long-off
comes on slow and he stays back and punches it back to the bowler
he stays back and works it to the on side
he rocks back to a short ball and pulls him down to long-on where Lakmal dives
take cover at deep midwicket! Drop it short at your own peril to Maqsood, sat up nicely for him to pound that several rows over the boundary
goes the other way! Makes room to a fuller one and carves it over extra cover
fullish in length and he works it to the off side
down the track and he checks his shot to the on side
this was a low full toss which he drills down to long-on
fires that on the pads and he makes room and mistimes it to the leg side
makes room to swing this across the line and he mistimes it to midwicket
goes to 101 with a big hit! This was full on middle and leg and with one free swing he goes downtown over long-on, bends down and does the sajda on the pitch
the clean hits don't end here! Senanayake drops it short on seeing him advance and he still manages to slam it over wide long-on
chance! He miscues a low full toss and it lobs up towards long-off who runs forward but can't get to it
flighted delivery and he drives to long-on
gets down the track and he scoops it inside out over extra cover

a run-out cuts short such an exciting innings from the young man! Hafeez tucks it with the turn to deep midwicket, takes the first run quickly but Maqsood was very keen on the second, Hafeez was watching the fielder and told Maqsood to scamper back  but it was too late, throw was to the keeper
jams out a yorker to midwicket
yorker length on off which he drills to long-on
that was pretty well played, inswinging yorker and he flicks it away neatly down to deep square leg
fires that full outside off and he jams it out to short third man
that rocketed off the bat! This was fired full and quick outside off, gets under the bounce and scoops it over cover
fires in  the yorker on the pads and he middles it well down to deep midwicket
fine yorker outside the off stump and he does well to dig it out to the off side
Lakmal loses control of that one and fires that one wide down the leg side
yorker on middle and leg which Afridi digs out to long-on
fullish in length on the pads which he whips out to fine leg
over the roof! Can we have the ball back please? Afridi made room, Lakmal bowled it full, bent forward and smoked that over deep extra cover
attempts the Helicopter Stroke and does a pretty good job of it and falls over! Three men go chasing after it at deep midwicket
just clears the rope, Lakmal fires that full on the pads and Afridi whips this one flat down to deep midwicket
digs out a yorker to the off side and takes an easy single
he makes room to another yorker and still manages to work it away down to deep midwcket
an inswinging full toss which he chips towards midwicket and Thirimanne does well to dive to his left but the ball doesn't stick, tough chance
full on the pads and he works it away down to deep square leg
a rare dot ball, Hafeez down the track to a yorker and he can only dig it back to the bowler
does well to flick a low full toss down to deep midwicket
full ball on middle and leg which he drills down to long-on
full ball on the pads, very risky against Afridi, whips it away to the leg side and rockets towards long leg, fine leg couldn't do much
he'll have to pay up if he keeps sending them out of the stadium! Makes room to a fuller one and scoops it inside out over deep cover, lands on the tented roof and rolls away

temporary relief for SL! Thisara comes round the wicket and fires it full on the off stump, Afridi walks across his stumps trying to paddle it down to fine leg, the ball goes past his left leg and hits the base of the off stump

Appeal for a caught behind and he's been given not out and SL want it reviewed, Akmal moves across his stumps to paddle it away and the ball lobs off some part of his body and goes to the wicketkeeper, the ball landed outside off and hit him on the thigh pad, Hawk Eye said that was clearing the stumps so no chance of an lbw, no evidence of the ball brushing the glove either so he survives
makes room and cuts him down to point
he makes room to a yorker and forces it to the leg side
low full toss and he makes room and shovels it to deep midwicket
makes room and hammers it down to long-on, fumble but it doesn't cost a run
makes room to a yorker and he squirts it out firmly towards sweeper cover
comes down the track and jams it out towards cover and sets off quickly, the field is up there
not much going right for SL, down the track to a yorker and he gets an inside edge towards fine leg, the fielder cannot cut it off
he makes room and digs out a yorker towards cover
inswinging yorker well wide of the leg stump and Akmal makes a lot of room and can only inside edge it to the pads
punishes a full toss! Six #14 tonight, swings it across the line and sends it flat over deep square leg
a fine knock comes to an end! Gets a length ball and makes room and miscues it to midwicket, it was a tired hoick, easy one for the fielder
jams out a full delivery down to long-on
full and quick outside off and he gets an outside edge straight to short third man and it's only a single

inn2.comm: starts off with one on target and Kusal defends
he comes down the track and hammers it down to mid-off
flatter delivery and he whips this one away down to midwicket
he stays back and punches it down to long-on
flatter one and he stays back and works it to square leg
quicker one and he stays back to defend
he really chases a wide one there, swishes and misses one outside the off stump
this was also fairly wide and he slashed at this one as well and nearly edged it
fires it on the stumps and he stays back and defends
this was far too wide, and short, Dilshan decided there was no point chasing this
hits a good length on middle and leg and he pushes it towards mid-on
he goes back at the crease and punches it just wide of mid-on
he fires that full and wide outside off and he mistimes the drive wide of cover
he stays back and punches it down to mid-on
bowls that one quicker and he stays back to defend
gives it more air and he clips it away wide of midwicket
he goes back at the crease and knocks it to the on side
Kusal was quick to rock back and cut it hard, point dives and does well to get a hand to it, saved a few
tossed up and he stays back and defends
good length on the stumps and he knocks it to the on side
comes back in and he gets across and defends to the on side
good length on middle and leg and he stays back and knocks it to the on side
he stays right back and times his punch really well wide of cover, Maqsood gives chase and slides
he goes for the pull and gets an under edge which goes on the bounce to the wicketkeeper
fires that full outside off and he looks to smash it but mistimes it
he stays back and clips it to the on side
chips it on the up and the ball drops short of midwicket
that was swept hard! Flatter one on the pads, Dilshan on his knee quickly and fires it to deep square leg
he stays back and works it to the on side
drifts on the pads and he clips it straight to short fine leg
stays back and clips it against the the turn to the on side
he stays right back at the crease and chops it to the off side
that was cut off the middle of the bat but his placement was not perfect, found backward point
edges it to the pads to the leg side
works it to square leg and he has to hurry, the throw to the bowler's end was just wide of the stumps
this was a bouncer and Kusal had to fetch that from over his head and pull
lovely shot, this was short and wide outside the off stump and he slashes and connects well wide of point
he goes back at the crease and works it away wide of midwicket
flatter one that skids and hits his pad and there's an appeal, looked like missing leg
shuffles and works it with the turn wide of short fine leg, Shehzad gives the chase
he stays behind and works it behind square
flatter one and he stays back and works it to mid-on
drifts towards the pads and he works it away down to midwicket
he stays back at the crease and punches it towards mid-off
he stays back at the crease and he punches it down the ground to mid-off
he stays right behind the line and defends down the track
nicely played! This was drifting down the leg side and there was a big gap at the deep on the leg side, Kusal swiveled and pulled it there
good length on the pads and worked to the leg side
tossed up and he pushed it to the off side
he tucks it away towards deep square leg
Kusal once again picks a big gap at deep square leg, flatter one and he gets on his knee and sweeps
flatter one and he comes forward and defends
quicker and he tucks it away to square leg
bowls a good length on the off stump and he stays back to defend
fullish in length outside off and he drives him firmly but straight to short extra cover
good length outside off and he punches it to the off side
he tucks it away towards square leg and there's a misfield, looked like Bhatti
stays back at the crease and he defends a length ball
picks a length ball from the stumps and drops it wide of mid-on
Junaid comes round the wicket to Dilshan, bowls it short and wide and he cuts it away
Kusal's punished a short one! This was fractionally short and Kusal hit it like he was waiting for it, off the middle and a few rows back over deep midwicket
good length on the body and worked to the on side
fullish in length on the off stump and he drives it to the off side
on a good length on the off stump and he punches it to the off side
a touch wider and he cuts him down to third man
an auspicious start for Ajmal as he misfields off his own bowling
comes forward and knocks it towards square leg where the fielder sprints and cuts it off
he stays back and punches it back to the bowler
Kusal has to adjust quickly and defend back to the bowler
rocks back and defends back to the bowler
he stabs at it and the ball's in the air wide of Ajmal, there's some confusion, Kusal was halfway down and had to scamper back, Ajmal's flick didn't work out
he places it wide of mid-on
this one was dropped a bit short and he pulls it with force but can't beat deep square leg
gives him width and he mistimes it to cover
fullish outside off and Dilshan gives it a whack but he finds cover, good shot for no run

Dilshan fails to get his placement right two balls in a row but this time he pays the price! Good field placement by the captain to have a deep square leg, it was short and Dilshan couldn't resist the pull, hits it flat and quick to Hafeez who takes a few paces back and takes the catch, falls over with the momentum
Sanga looks to flick it to the on side but the ball skids and hits his pads
he  stays back and punches it to the on side
goes back and places it to sweeper cover
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
comes forward and takes a single to long-off
a bit too straight and he works it away down to deep square leg
he fires this on a good length and he stays back and defends
Kusal's been imperious with that pull! Fractionally short, Kusal stays back and pulls with ease wide of square leg
short of a length and he flicks it away behind square on the on side
Kusal's pulls have been a treat! Goes in front of square this time, short of a length, read the length early and it just drops short of the deep midwicket rope
he stretches out to slower ball wide outside the off stump, mistimes it over cover
comes forward and drives a fuller delivery down to wide long-off
tucks it away wide of square leg
gets forward and drives straight to cover
fullish on middle and leg and works it to midwicket
pushes it with soft hands towards cover and sets off quickly, completes his fifty!
he goes back at the crease and punches it to long-off
tossed up outside off and he drives him down to deep cover
drifting on the pads and he works it to midwicket
goes back at the crease and punches it to long-off
works it against the turn to deep midwicket, fielding a bit slack and they take a second
gets forward and drives down the track
comes forward and across and he mistimes the drive
he stays back and works it away wide of short fine leg
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
down the track and he checks his shot
he goes back and punches it to the off side
quicker delivery and he adjusts quickly and defends
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
he goes back and pushes it to the off side
he stays back and gets a leading edge, drops short of cover
flatter one on the pads and he clips it to the on side
he gets forward and drives him wide of cover
goes back at the crease and drills it down to long-on
he stays back and defends down the track
he comes down the track and defends to the off side
quicker one that skids through and hits him on the pads
he clips it down to deep square leg
full on the pads and worked to the on side
flatter ball and he punches it back to the bowler
slower through the air and Sanga has a feel for it and misses
he goes back and punches it towards cover
he stays back and punches it towards long-off
he stays back and punches it to midwicket
comes down the track and punches it towards long-on
gives it more air and he pushes it to the off side
he stays back and punches it with the turn to mid-on
a bit streaky! Quicker and shorter, Kusal made room aiming to hit over the off side but got an outside edge that beat short third man
he rocks back and punches it wide of cover
he stays back and punches it to the off side
flatter ball and he punches it away wide of cover
wider outside off and he rocks back and punches it to deep cover
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
flatter one and he rocks back and punches it wide of cover
he stays back and punches it down the ground to long-off

Kusal's been given out lbw and he wants to review it. From round the wicket, pitches on middle and leg and straightens, the turn squared him up and struck him on the thigh pad, he was playing back and that led to his undoing, Hawk Eye says that was clipping the top of middle
fullish in length and he clips it to the on side
poor ball, short and wide outside off and he punches it straight to cover
fuller in length outside off and he punches it wide of cover
fires that full on off and middle and he works it to the on side
he goes back and punches it to the off side
he stays back and tucks it away wide of midwicket
slides this one towards the pads and the ball clips and pads and rolls away
drives to the off side and Misbah misfields at cover, is it the dew?
Chandimal gives the charge, comes to pitch of it and lofts a straight six, didn't look in control initially but it traveled alright
he works it away to the on side
gets forward and works it towards midwicket
fuller in length and pushed to long-on
he pushes it down the track to long-off
he stays back and punches it to the on side

Afridi's got the Big Fish! And he ditched his trademark 'X' celebration and instead took off with his arm outstretched. It was wide outside off and Sanga chased it, thick outside edge and Akmal fumbled and took it on the second attempt. Afridi's celebration was a bit unusual too
he stays back and defends
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
full outside off and defended to the off side
fullish in length and he defends
skids through and he clips it away towards mid-on
fullish in length outside off and he drives him wide of cover
tucks him up for room and he nearly chops it back towards his stumps
this was on a good length outside the off stump and he angles it wide of point
gets forward and across but can't punch it wide of cover
fullish in length on the off stump and he punches it to mid-off
gets beside the line and punches it wide of point
fullish outside the off stump and driven down to long-off
quicker one and he drills it down the track
gives it more air and he plonks forward and defends
he comes down the track and plays all around it, the ball lobs off the pads and rolls away
punches it towards cover and they hurry the single, throw was to the keeper
he stays beside the line and punches it towards point
sucked him into the drive, this was pitched up and seamed away, nearly edged that as he chased it
keeps it nice and straight on the stumps, he can only punch it to mid-on
this one moved away from him and he glides it with control wide of slip, Sharjeel dives at third man but the ball rolls towards the rope
good length on the stumps and he punches it to point
cuts another one towards backward point
tossed up and he drives him down to long-on
he stays back at the crease and punches it to the bowler
he stays back at the crease and he works it to the on side

that's a sharp catch! Tossed up and Thirimanne gets on his knee for the slog, he timed it well  but Maqsood jogs to his right, leaps and takes the catch. It looked like Maqsood was standing a few yards much in front of the rope but he adjusted
clips it down to square leg
full and moving in and he drives down the track
fullish in length on the stumps and he drills it back to the bowler
drifting towards the pads and the ball drops to the on side
cramps him up for room and he drives back to the bowler
fullish on the stumps and turned to the on side
fires that full on the pads and he fails to flick it away, stifled appeal
drifting down leg and the ball clips the pads and rolls away
goes back and punches it to the off side
bowls that full and he defends to the off side
down the leg side and he knocks it to the on side

Appeal for an lbw and he has been given not out and Afridi wants it reviewed, pitched on off and middle and the ball was coming back in, hits his pads and strikes him outside the line of the leg stump, at normal speed it looked like missing leg but Afridi was vehement and Misbah gave in. Hawk Eye shows that missing the leg stump. Afridi wastes a review
full on the stumps and he flicks it to square leg
pitched up and he goes for the heave, the ball rolls to the on side
he comes forward and drives it to long-on
flatter one outside off and he cuts it to point
this was the bouncer and Chandimal withdrew the stroke
fired that full on the pads and he works it to the on side
flatter one and he works it to long-on
he comes forward and defends
tossed up and Chandimal comes down the track and lofts him over wide long-on
he tucks it to the on side for a single
flatter one and he gets forward to defend
he bangs it in short and wide down the leg side
that's a low full toss which he drills down to long-off
length ball on the stumps and he whips it in the air over midwicket
this was a loosener down the leg side, on the pads and he clips it away down to fine leg
he bangs this one in short and it comfortably cleared the batsman, wide called
fires that full on the pads and he works it away down to deep square leg
he stays beside the line and punches it to the off side
SL need plenty more of that! Half volley outside off, Chandimal gets under the bounce and scoops it high over long-off, lands several rows back
he stays back and knocks it to the on side
on the pads and he works it to square leg
he works it to the on side
this was fired in flatter, looked to cut but missed, close call
quicker one and he forces it to the on side
gets forward and drives to the off side

fires in a yorker from wide of the crease bowling round the wicket, he nearly falls over at the crease as he whips it to short fine leg,there's a shy at the stumps and they take a run off the deflection
drives down the track and hits the stumps at the other end
this was drifting on the body and he pulled it behind square
slower ball and he drives it to cover
full on the stumps and it was a neat straight drive, two fielders converge in the deep, long-on cuts it off
flicked away to the on side and Afridi dives and stops it at midwicket
on the pads and he works it to square leg
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
Freebie here, the doosra was fired in a bit wide outside off, Chandimal looks to slog but misses, beats Akmal and down to third man
turns it to square leg
he stays back and clips it towards midwicket
that sped off the bat! Mathews gave him the charge and hammered that off the middle wide of midwicket, it was a flat hit

ouch! Fired that from round the wicket on the pads, he looks to whip it away and the ball hits him near the knee, there was no pad protection there and that really stung, Chandimal limps, the physio gets the magic spray
slower ball outside the off stump, he makes room and slaps it straight to cover
slower ball outside off and he swings and misses
backs away and tucks it away down to the on side
yorker length outside off and he places it to backward point
that was cracked away! Length ball outside off, Chandimal made room and smashed that wide of backward point
takes on Ajmal! This was dropped a bit short from round the wicket, Mathews cleared the front leg and bashed that flat and over long-on
he clips it with the turn to the leg side
he moves back at the crease and pounds it to cover where Afridi does well to dive and stop it
fires that full and he drives it straight to Afridi again

close call for Chandimal! He gave the charge and lofted him flat to long-on, it should have been taken but Shehzad made the mistake of standing a few too many yards in front, threw himself backwards and the ball landed in front of the rope

a direct hit by Ajmal! Turned it to the on side and set off for a very risky single, Ajmal took off to his right, gathered it and in one motion took aim at his own end, had just one stump to aim at and boy was he accurate! Chandimal has to go
this was wide outside off and Thisara slashes and misses
this was much too wide outside the off stump
fires that full and wide outside off and he drives to deep cover
he stays back at the crease and defends because he was cramped for room
that was a soft dismissal! Junaid fires a length ball from round the wicket, Mathews made room to slap it away but the ball hits the splice of the bat and the top edge swirls to mid-off
lands it outside off and he shapes to cut but misses
fullish on the pads and he clips it to mid-on
that was pounded away, this was a low full toss and Thisara smashed it off the middle of the bat and down the ground
spooned it to cover! Length ball from Bhatti outside off, Thisara looks to punch it away over cover but failed to place it properly
ducks under the short ball
this time he stands up to the short ball and pulls it to  fine-leg for a single
stands tall and punches a  single to cover
he fires that full outside off and the mid-off was up, crashed that wide of him
he punches it towards the boundary for a quick single
he bowls a length ball on middle and leg and the batsman swivels and clubs it wide of midwicket
mid-off is up, he lofts a length ball through the line and clears the infield, down to long-off
shot of a genuine batsman, this was a touch wide outside the off stump, opens the face of the bat and slices it wide of backward point, great timing
slower ball and pulled straight to Afridi at square leg
slower ball and he swings and miscues the pull
the boundaries are coming but is it too late? Drops it short and wide outside off, stays back and cuts it hard wide of point
fullish on the stumps and he drills it down to long-on
this was bowled short and he tucks it away to deep midwicket
he tucks it away down to deep square leg
fires that on the pads and he looks to sweep, the ball rolls off his pads to the on side
he stays beside the line and punches it to the off side
tucks him up for room and he can only punch it back to the bowler
clean strike, that was dropped a fraction short and he swiveled and clubbed it over deep square leg
this was a fraction slower outside off, Prasanna was too early on the shot and swung at thin air
they may not win but they're getting batting practice nevertheless, this was quicker and sitting up to be hit outside off, makes room and scoops it over point
fires that full and he drills it straight to cover and takes off, Misbah misses the stumps
nearly gave it away! Paddles it towards short fine leg and it lobs up in the air, Tanvir doesn't really bother going for it
much slower through the air and he gets down to sweep but misses
connect this time! Drops it shorter and quicker, Prasanna stays back and pulls over deep square leg, Umar Akmal says "tez naa karo" (don't bowl it fast)
fullish in length outside off and he drives to mid-off
he foxes him with the doosra outside off, extra bounce
beats him with the doosra again, Akmal breaks the stumps
and suddenly the 50 stand is up in just 29 balls! A length ball outside the off stump and Prasanna makes room and scoops it over mid-off
streaky! Length ball again from round the wicket, he is cramped for room and gets an inside edge that beats the keeper
steers it towards third man and pinches a single
a misfield leaks a boundary and Ajmal the culprit! Senanayake made room and deliberately angled it towards third man, Ajmal had it covered at short third man and made a complete mess of it
makes room and chips it in the air down to the vacant spaces at deep square leg
slashes and misses, a bit too close to cut and the frustration gets to Tanvir who yells out a swear word - not at the batsman, just at the situation
good start to the over again! Bhatti errs by bowling length, sat up nicely for Senanayake to belt it over midwicket, finds the big gap there, getting closer are we?
this was fuller in length outside the off stump and he went for the slash and missed
fuller outside the off stump and thrashed straight to cover, some relied for Pakistan
that's a good comeback by Bhatti to bowl a sharpo bouncer, followed Prasanna who backed away to slog that
a six to spice things up further! This was banged in short, Prasanna backed away and connected the hook well, cleared long leg
6 + 4! The fuller length fails Bhatti, outside off and another 'hit me' ball, Prasanna backs away and scoops it over point nobody patrolling the deep
Out of the stadium! Fetch that! This was bowled too full and was a slower ball too, stood at the crease and launched miles and miles over wide long-on
bowls a good length outside off, makes room and places it wide of point, relief for pakistan as it's only two
there are lots of cries for yorkers but Tanvir sticks to length, makes room and swings but misses, clears the stumps
and Akmal fumbles! Oh dear! It was a high full toss, Senenayake made room and swung and failed to make contact, Akmal failed to gather it and it the ball raced to the fine leg boundary

and the 12th man Anwar Ali takes it on the second attempt! Senanayake made room and scooped it over cover, didn't time it well, Anwar ran forward from sweeper cover, had it covered and the ball popped out, he had the presence of mind to stick his right hand out, turn around and take the catch, phew!
on the pads and he tickles it to the on side, only a run

and we have a run out off the first ball! Junaid fires a length ball and Prasanna swings and mistimes it to deep midwicket, Malinga sets off for the second to get off strike but his partner is not interested seeing Bhatti's accurate throw to Akmal, Malinga turns around but it's too late
he can only jam out a full ball towards cover for a single
he fires a length ball on the body and swings but can only place it slightly wide of short fine leg, Prasanna decides not to take the single

the tension's over and Pakistan have won! Junaid fired this one full on the off stump, Prasanna made room looking to scoop it over the off side but it dipped and landed safely on Sharjeel's palms at mid-off
